overview:
Anton Litvinenko is a software development entrepreneur. He is the co-founder and CTO of Programeter, an analytics company that offers development teams a tool to watch the progress & quality of their software projects. Programeter is Anton’s second start-up along with devPulse, a semantic project notifications service.

Anton is an experienced researcher in the field of computer science. His thesis Automatic Prediction of Source Code Contribution Type made the technological core of Programeter, and his conception of intelligent project management software was a winner of New Entrepreneurs in Technology and Science (NETS) business ideas competition. Anton has 10 years of working experience in the field of software development as a developer, a software systems architect and a team lead.

In his spare time, Anton Litvinenko lectures at the University of Tartu on the topic of software metrics and cherishes his start-ups Programeter and devPulse.
